mapper.insert: insert into tb_product(product_id, product_name, product_info, price, stock, company, category_no, animal_no, sell_condition) values(#{productId}, #{productName}, #{productInfo}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{company}, #{categoryNo}, #{animalNo}, #{sellCondition})
insert into tb_image(product_id, ORI_NAME, NAME, PATH) values(#{productId}, #{oriName}, #{name}, #{path})
mapper.update: update tb_product set product_Id = #{productId}, product_name = #{productName}, product_info = #{productInfo}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, company = #{company}, category_no = #{categoryNo}, animal_no = #{animalNo}, sell_condition = #{sellCondition} where product_id = #{orgProductId}
